name: BugFrost
description:
I didn't finish this project. But still decided to put  it for review maybe someone will be interested in making survival strategy with bugs) 

https://github.com/doudar41/BugFrost This is scripts repository as requested. I struggle to make WebGL version of it but I failed it seems Unity  2.2 have some issues with it. 

What I learn from building this. That if I next time will make navmesh in Unity 2D project I am not going to use sprite tiles or I need to study how it works again. 

I experimented with pathfinding building chess like version of this game. And now I have better understanding how pathfinding works actually. 

Make 2d player rotation toward target it's real pain) But done.

I made class inside script to use it as struct object. Find it useful. 

Try to use FMOD with WebGL. Unfortunately, this build as WebGL is failed but it's possible to use it and it's great.  

So maybe I didn't make good game but learned a lot)
